content:
Opinion:

Assessment team concludes the following:

Vv vcs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

a) There is no material discrepancies between project implementation and the project description provided in the registered PD /05/ except deviations as mentioned under section 3.3 of this report which do not affect the scale, baseline or the additionality of the project and hence accepted to the verification team.

b) The monitoring plan is implemented completely and monitoring system (i.e., process and schedule for obtaining, recording, compiling and analysing the monitored data and parameters) is appropriate.

c) There is no material discrepancies between the actual monitoring system, and the monitoring plan set out in the project description and the applied methodology.

d) The GHG emission reductions or removals generated by the project (for this monitoring period) have not included in an emissions trading program or any other mechanism that includes GHG allowance trading.

e) For this monitoring period, the project has not received or sought any other form of environmental credit.

In view of the informationâ€™s as verified above, the assessment team is able to conclude that the project has been implemented as described in the project description except deviations as mentioned under section 3.3 of this report which do not affect the scale, baseline or the additionality of the project and hence accepted to the verification team.
